'''''Tengwestië''''' is the online journal of the [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]] focusing primarily on the invented languages of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. It was started in [[2003]] and is edited by [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]].<ref name="ELF">{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.elvish.org/Tengwestie/|articlename=Tengwestië|dated=22 February 2022|website=Tengwestië|accessed=8 January 2025}}</ref>
